title: Eminem’s daughter Hailie Jade nails Halloween as she channels Ariana Grande
text:
An amazing Ariana homage (Picture: Instagram)

Eminem’s daughter Hailie Jade has nailed Halloween and got the seal of approval from Ariana Grande herself.

The social media influencer, 23, dressed as Ariana for the spooky celebrations, donning an oversized, checked top, thigh-high boots and a high ponytail.

She accessorised with a lollipop as she mimicked the Thank u, next singer’s look from when she was papped with former fiancé Pete Davidson.

Sharing the shots on Instagram, Hailie captioned the homage with seven diamond rings, a nod to Ariana’s song 7 Rings.

It’s all very brilliant and even Ariana approved as she commented with a black heart emoji and another ring to add to the mix.

It’s a real look, that’s for sure.

The inspo (Picture: GC Images)

Hailie, who is the eldest child of Eminem – real name, Marshall Mathers – is making a name for herself in the influencing world, with a carefully curated Instagram feed that shows off a pretty stylish and health-focused life.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Eminem shares Hailie with his ex-wife Kimberley Scott. They married in 1991, divorcing two years later in 2001 before reconciling and remarrying in 2006.

Things didn’t last long second time round and they divorced again just months later.

Hailie is Eminem’s eldest child (Picture: Rex Features)

Speaking about her famous dad, Hailie said last year that she and Eminem are very close. He, meanwhile, says daughter Hailie is his ‘main source of drive and motivation.’

In a 2002 interview, Eminem said: ‘She has been my main source of drive and motivation, especially when she was first born. I didn’t have a career yet, I didn’t have money, I didn’t have a place to live.

‘I think that kicked me in the a*** harder knowing, “How am I going to raise her?”

‘She’s always been the driving force for me to stay busy, stay focused, always been my number one reason for fear of failure. I can’t fail. I can’t have her grow up and not be able to say, “My dad succeeded”.’

He added: ‘I talk about her a lot, the truth is she is all I got in this world. If everything ended tomorrow, she’s all that I have.’

description: Eminem’s daughter Hailie Jade nails Halloween as she channels Ariana Grande for spooky holiday.
